title: Netanyahu Commands , US Obeys
message:
When the Biden administration withheld a symbolic shipment of weapons to Israel, Netanyahu counted on Congress to draft a law that would withhold funding for the State Dept.
and the Pentagon if Biden did not give Netanyahu the weapons he needs to “finish the job” in Gaza.
HolocaustWestern governments retain inherited guilt for their deplorable behavior during the Second World War regarding the Holocaust.
So World War II is invoked constantly by American leaders when embarking on new overseas adventures.
How cynical is it for descendants of survivors of the Second World War genocide to invoke the Holocaust to perpetrate a genocide of their own?
event_breakdown:
Israeli politician Itamar Ben Gvir hung a homophobic banner outside Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s residence during Pride Month. The banner depicted LGBT rainbow with and crossed through by a pink swastika, and the phrase “’Love conquers all’ is the slogan of LGBT fascism.”
Ben Gvir is a member of the extremist Jewish Power party.
Another Jewish Power lawmaker, Benzi Gopstein, was investigated for using anti-Arab rhetoric, and was charged with incitement to racism.
